casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Larry J. EDWARDS. No. 82P16. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 13, 2016. Larry J. Edwards, for Edwards, Larry J. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. James R. Woodall, Jr., District Attorney, for State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 9th of March 2016 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Orange County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of April 2016."
ERVIN, J. recused.
